rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious area near the North-facing entrance that doubles as a reception space. Adheres to Vastu principles by maintaining an unobstructed flow from the entrance.

rooms.name: Dining and Kitchen
rooms.description: A combined dining-kitchen space that utilizes natural light from large windows. The kitchen is designed to be compact due to budget constraints while ensuring ample counter space.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact bathroom with basic fixtures placed to respect privacy and adhere to local building norms.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A small dedicated library space that uses bookshelf units along one wall. Placed near the entrance to maintain flow and alignment with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A modest gym with essential fitness equipment. Positioned in a corner of the ground floor, ensuring that its noise and movement do not disturb other living areas.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest room with minimal furniture. Positioned away from the main living spaces for privacy.
